<MethodEndpoint

</MethodEndpoint>



Connect a stripe account to a lock

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}

>
  
</RequestSchema>
